text: A mech or mecha is a large, pilotable robot. Mech may also refer to: * Mech (surname) * Mech infantry or mechanized infantry * Mech language or Bodo * Mech radar, a Russian airborne radar system * Mech tribe, a tribe of India and belong to Bodo-Kachari group of tribes * Mech, a type of electronic cigarette; see Construction of electronic cigarettes * Mechanical keyboard ==See also== * Mecha anime and manga, a genre of anime and manga that features giant robots * Mechanics * Mechanism (engineering)
title: Mech (disambiguation)
